main: ^Hi there, I'm Mayor Garth. Welcome to Susfishious!
^You've arrived in time for the annual fishing competition!
^Yeah, that why I'm here, for the competiton.
yescomp: ^Excellent! I'm sure you'll have a wondeful time here.
^Look's like you've been out fishing already. Have you had any luck yet?
compinfo: ^Our little town prides itself on the wide variey of fish in our pristine lake.
^We hold this competiton annually to celebrate and share our passion for fishing.
fishask: ^Look's like you've been fishing today. Have you had any luck yet?
nofish: ^There's still plenty of time left in the day to head back out in the water.
^Or you could ask some of our local fishing experts for some tips.
^Anyway, I hope you enjoy your time here.
fishy: ^Now tell me, what do you think this fish looks like?
notsusfishious: ^A fish you say? Well, it looks like a fish to me too.
^Were you expecting to catch something else? A frying pan perhaps?
^I could go for some lovely fried fish right now, but I'm not planning to leave the festival just yet. Maybe later though.
^That gives me an idea. Maybe later on you could ask our local barkeep Jamie to fry up that fish of yours for tea. Now wouldn't that be delicious.
yes: ^Excellent! Then I hope you enjoy your time here.
weirdfish: ^A weird-looking fish you say? I assure you that its just one of the local species.
megafish: ^You caught a megafish? Wow! It looks like this section isn't finished yet.
